name: part_004
file: tmp_【#あくシオ3Dライブ】おうたのはっぴょうかい！【ホロライブ⧸湊あくあ・紫咲シオン】 [_xL58zG9k5k]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_004.mov

scenes.description: Performance of 'Bring It On' (劣等上等).
Performance of 'Sil vous president' (シル・ヴ・プレジデント).
Aqua and Shion arguing over who Okayu will marry.

subtitles.original: こんなもんじゃない　だっだっだっ　私大人になる
subtitles.english: It's not just this, da-da-da, I'm becoming an adult

subtitles.original: つい今雨をも噛み分けて今
subtitles.english: Just now, I'm parting the rain and now...

subtitles.original: 燦々交ざる現代（いま）は僕らを　絶対離さないのだ
subtitles.english: The brilliantly mixing present will never let us go

subtitles.original: 期待待ってくれない　すべてを背負って
subtitles.english: Expectations won't wait, carrying everything on my back

subtitles.original: 生き抜いて上等だわ
subtitles.english: Surviving is just fine

subtitles.original: それでは皆様お先にバイバイ
subtitles.english: Now then, everyone, bye-bye ahead of you

subtitles.original: ロマンスの不祥事　逃がさない
subtitles.english: I won't let a romance scandal escape

subtitles.original: 消してあげる
subtitles.english: I'll erase it for you

subtitles.original: 先生！私が大統領になったら、人の男にちょっかいかける女は島流しにします！
subtitles.english: Teacher! When I become president, women who mess with other people's men will be exiled!

subtitles.original: 先生！私が大統領になったら、「いやただの友達だよ～」ってごまかすやつをおへそから電気を流します！
subtitles.english: Teacher! When I become president, I'll send electricity through the navels of people who make excuses like "No, we're just friends"!

subtitles.original: だだだ大打撃　宣戦布告なのだクローズアップ
subtitles.english: Da-da-da major blow, it's a declaration of war, close up

subtitles.original: どどど独占欲　揺るぎない敵にサーチライト
subtitles.english: Do-do-do possessiveness, searchlights on the unwavering enemy

subtitles.original: 大嫌いしょうがない　クズは病気ねバイバイバイ
subtitles.english: I hate you, it can't be helped. Scum is a sickness, bye-bye-bye

subtitles.original: 権利・語彙・財産・知名度　何もないけど裁きたい　でしょ？
subtitles.english: Rights, vocabulary, wealth, fame... I have none of those, but I want to judge you, right?

subtitles.original: だだだ大統領になったらね　まずは君を捕まえるね
subtitles.english: When I become president, first I'll capture you

subtitles.original: 濡れたタオルで洗いざらい吐かせるね
subtitles.english: I'll make you confess everything with a wet towel

subtitles.original: 誰ですかあの子　ダメですかそうですか
subtitles.english: Who is that girl? Is she a no-go? I see...

subtitles.original: ロマンスの不祥事　逃がさない
subtitles.english: I won't let a romance scandal escape

subtitles.original: 消してあげる　シル・ヴ・プレプレプレジデント
subtitles.english: I'll erase it for you, S'il vous pre-pre-president

subtitles.original: 先生！私が大統領になったら、「ただの仕事の付き合いだよ～」って言うやつは二度と働けなくしてやります！
subtitles.english: Teacher! When I become president, I'll make sure people who say "It's just a work relationship" can never work again!

subtitles.original: 先生！いかにも「いや向こうが強引でさぁ～」っていう男の口にはネジを流し込んで固めてやります！
subtitles.english: Teacher! I'll pour screws into the mouths of men who act like "No, she was the aggressive one" and harden them!

subtitles.original: みみみ見えちゃう　まるでドロ沼だねアンバランス
subtitles.english: I-I-I can see it, it's like a quagmire, unbalanced

subtitles.original: ままま丸見え　自作自演なしのスクープね
subtitles.english: M-m-m fully visible, a scoop with no staged performance

subtitles.original: 愛はない理由じゃない　悪くないのねはいはいはい
subtitles.english: It's not that there's no love. You're not at fault, yeah yeah yeah

subtitles.original: 軽薄なママで意気揚々　何もないとかありえない　でしょ？
subtitles.english: In high spirits while remaining frivolous. It's impossible for there to be nothing, right?

subtitles.original: だだだ大統領になってもね　多分君は変わらないね
subtitles.english: Even when I become president, you probably won't change

subtitles.original: しらっととぼけて　のらりくらり交わすのね
subtitles.english: Playing innocent and avoiding the subject

subtitles.original: どうですかこんばんは　本気ですかそうですか
subtitles.english: How are you? Good evening. Are you serious? I see...

subtitles.original: 情熱は不注意　いれますか　消してしまいたい
subtitles.english: Passion is carelessness. Shall I put it in? I want to erase it

subtitles.original: だだだ大統領になったらね　マジで君を捕まえるね
subtitles.english: When I become president, I'll seriously capture you

subtitles.original: 濡れたタオルで洗いざらい吐かせるね
subtitles.english: I'll make you confess everything with a wet towel

subtitles.original: どこですか今あんた　見つけちゃったバレちゃった
subtitles.english: Where are you now? I found you, you're caught

subtitles.original: 容赦にはご用心　さようなら　代わりに銃声
subtitles.english: Beware of mercy. Goodbye. A gunshot instead

subtitles.original: シル・ヴ・プレプレプレジデント
subtitles.english: S'il vous pre-pre-president

subtitles.original: はー、おかゆ今日もかっこいいなあ
subtitles.english: Haa, Okayu is so cool today too.

subtitles.original: おかゆ明日結婚しようね
subtitles.english: Okayu, let's get married tomorrow.

subtitles.original: あーおかゆー！ おかゆー！
subtitles.english: Ah, Okayu! Okayu!

subtitles.original: は？
subtitles.english: Huh?

subtitles.original: 私のおかゆだけど
subtitles.english: She's my Okayu, though.

subtitles.original: え？
subtitles.english: What?

subtitles.original: シオン、おかゆと明日結婚するけどな
subtitles.english: Well, I'm getting married to Okayu tomorrow.

subtitles.original: え？
subtitles.english: What?

subtitles.original: 待って、おかゆは私と結婚するんだよ
subtitles.english: Wait, Okayu is getting married to me.

subtitles.original: え、結婚しようって言ってないでしょ
subtitles.english: Eh, she didn't say she would, right?

subtitles.original: え、でも「待って」って言われてるんだよ
subtitles.english: Eh, but she told me to "wait".

subtitles.original: 違うよ、だっておかゆ明日結婚するって言ってたもん
subtitles.english: No, because Okayu said we're getting married tomorrow.

subtitles.original: え、それ何回言われてんの？だってもう結婚するって言われて2年近く言われてまだ結婚してないんだよ
subtitles.english: Eh, how many times has she told you that? She's been saying that for nearly two years and you're still not married.

subtitles.original: そんなことないよ！
subtitles.english: That's not true!

subtitles.original: ゼクシィ買って、もう結婚してる！
subtitles.english: I bought Zexy, we're already married!

subtitles.original: あー！もう結婚してる！
subtitles.english: Ah! We're already married!

subtitles.original: 違う！
subtitles.english: No!
